translation.en: Hey, kid, it's not your fault. Come on. Come on.
translation.es: No es tú culpa, hombre. Ven, ven.

translation.en: - - It's OK.
- Calm down. -
- Hey, hey, wait, come on. -
- Hey, hey, hey. - Don't do that! Don't!
Hey, dude, raise your elbow, you know? Keep it straight up, always.
translation.es: Bien. Eleva tú brazo, aquí, como... - Todo el tiempo con fuerza. Bien. - ¡Mickey!

translation.en: Hey, Mickey!
translation.es: - Todo el tiempo con fuerza. Bien. - ¡Mickey!

translation.en: - I need you here. - Yeah.
The Mexican is not going to let you breathe, at least not in the early rounds.
translation.es: El mexicano no te dejará respirar, al menos no al inicio. ¿Sí?

translation.en: So you keep on moving. You use your diagonals.
translation.es: Mantente en movimiento y usa las diagonales.

translation.en: - Let's go, show him. - OK.
So, you've got to work Carmona from a distance, all the time.
translation.es: Tienes que tener a Carmona a buena distancia, todo el tiempo.

translation.en: If he shortens the distance, you try to escape, like this.
translation.es: Si él acorta la distancia, trata de escapar. Así.

translation.en: So, keep it all the time.
- Good? - OK, now you block his way.
translation.es: Mantenla todo el tiempo. Bien. Ahora mira cómo lo hace.

translation.en: - OK. - OK, so, this way.
And now this way.
- This way, yeah, block, block! - I see.
translation.es: Derecha. Bien. Bloquea, bloquea. Bloquea, abajo. Bien.

translation.en: Block, down. Good, this way. Again.
translation.es: Derecha. Bien. Bloquea, bloquea. Bloquea, abajo. Bien. Izquierda. De nuevo.

translation.en: Block. Yeah, good.
- Now, you're going to meet Tony. - Yeah, OK.
Is anyone going to sauna?
Yes.
You wanted to see us?  Yeah, come on in, both.
Sit down, sit down.
OK. Are we on schedule with Remu?
Yeah. He's on point, physically.
Yeah, and Carmona is not the same as he was before.
translation.es: Aunque Carmona no es el mismo de antes.

translation.en: Five years ago, he would've killed him, but I think now we have a chance.
translation.es: Cinco años atrás lo hubiera matado, pero tenemos oportunidad.

translation.en: Fuck, fuck! God damn it!
You're ready for the sparring sessions?
Fuck, God damn it!
I hate it too, this cold weather.
translation.es: También odio este clima tan frío.

translation.en: It's like when we were in Buffalo, remember?
translation.es: Es como cuando estábamos en Búfalo, ¿recuerdas?

translation.en: No, this is much worse.
I don't hate it. It just makes me too aware of everything.
translation.es: No lo odio, solo me hace estar consiente de todo.

translation.en: Too aware of my body.
Listen, Mickey.
We'll go through this fight, Remu wins, make some money to start over again.
translation.es: Cuando pasemos la pelea y Remu gane, tendremos dinero para iniciar de nuevo.

translation.en: Then, we might go our separate ways, but it won't happen like this,
translation.es: Y tomaremos caminos separados. Pero no sucederá así,

translation.en: - when you're late every fucking morning. - Yeah.
translation.es: si llegas tarde cada maldita mañana. Sí.

translation.en: Yeah, maybe this was a mistake, no?
translation.es: Sí, tal vez esto fue un error.

translation.en: Come on!
Focus on the body, and get out.
translation.es: Concéntrate en el cuerpo y sal.

translation.en: - Shit! - Long punches, Remu!
It's on fire!
Hey, cool off, man. It's not going to be so easy with Carmona.
translation.es: Tranquilo, hombre. No será tan fácil con Carmona.

translation.en: Stretch your arms, man, you look like a kid.
How do you think you're going to hit him with those tiny arms?
translation.es: ¿A quién le pegarás con esos pequeños brazos?

translation.en: Jump in, Mexican bitch.
Come on, fucking jump in, let's dance.
- Yeah, keep going. - You want to jiggle with this?
translation.es: - Sí, sí, continúa. - A ver si puedes con esto.

translation.en: Fucking punk.
All right, again! Go on. Leave him no chance!
translation.es: Bien, de nuevo. ¡Vamos! No le des oportunidad.

translation.en: Remu! Are you gonna win the championship for us?
Sarita. Look.
- What? - He's my Mexican friend, Mickey. Sarita.
translation.es: Él es mi amigo mexicano, Mickey. - Sarita. - Hola.

translation.en: - Hey. - Want a beer?
- Sure. - One beer, and a soda water for me.
translation.es: - ¿Cerveza? - Sí. Una cerveza, y agua mineral para mí.

translation.en: - Is she your wife? - No, you're married?
I have a daughter.
translation.es: - Tengo una hija. - Por tú hija.

translation.en: - For your daughter. - Cheers.
translation.es: - Tengo una hija. - Por tú hija. Sí, salud.

translation.en: Cheers.
You're doing great, man. Your legs are moving better now.
translation.es: Lo estás haciendo bien, mueves mejor las piernas.

translation.en: All I know is giving and taking punches.
translation.es: Solo sé dar y recibir golpes.

translation.en: Yeah, well. I guess we can call that a job.
translation.es: Sí, bueno... creo que lo llamamos trabajo.

translation.en: Hey, I'll be back in a second.
OK, hey.
- Need anything, Mickey? - No.
What was your name, again?
The blows to the head must be affecting your memory.
translation.es: Los golpes a la cabeza deben afectar tú memoria.

translation.en: Sarita. That's a Mexican name.
Do I look Mexican to you?
Karaoke here this Saturday.
Hey, Mickey! You can come up here, we need you.
Mickey!
I want a clean fight no holding, no hitting below the belt.
translation.es: Quiero una pelea limpia. Sin sujetar ni golpes debajo de la cintura.

translation.en: Good luck and have a good fight.
translation.es: Buena suerte, y tengan una buena pelea.

translation.en: Keep moving. Fight from the outside, and don't stay on the ropes too long.
translation.es: No pares, pelea desde afuera y mantente fuera de su alcance.

translation.en: Come on, Remu.
Come on, Remu, good.
Be careful.
- Get out of there! - Stay out of reach, man, come on!
translation.es: Fuera del alcance, salte. Fuera del alcance, hombre, ¡vamos!

translation.en: Stay closer.
Don't let him to get so close. If he gets his teeth on you, he won't let go.
translation.es: No dejes que se acerque tanto. Cuando ponga sus dientes en ti, no te dejará ir.

translation.en: Look at his eye. I can knock him out, boss, I can take him out.
translation.es: Mira su ojo, puedo noquearlo, jefe.

translation.en: Hey, move forward, move forward!
Hey, let him go!
Hey, hey, hey! The mouthpiece! He's wining time. That's fucking low, you bastard!
translation.es: ¡Oye, oye! ¡La boquilla! ¡Está ganando tiempo! ¡Eso es muy bajo, bastardo!

translation.en: Two, three, four.
You've got the points. Don't do anything foolish.
translation.es: Tienes los puntos, no hagas estupideces.

translation.en: Watch his jab, watch his jab!
- - Why are you stopping now?
Why'd you stop the fight now? Why the fuck did you stop now?
Don't stop, come on. He spits his fucking mouthpiece and you stop the fight?
translation.es: ¡No! Vamos, vamos. ¿Por qué detuviste la pelea, bastardo?

translation.en: Jesus Christ, man.
Go on, Jyrki! Kill him!
- I invested in this. - Yes, you did. I know.
translation.es: Invertí en esto como... Lo hiciste, lo sé.

translation.en: - You OK? - Better than ever.
It's not every day you lose...
a big match like that.
Yeah. Come on, have a drink.
- No, I'm good. - Hey, take it.
translation.es: No, estoy bien. - Toma un trago, celebremos. - No, estoy bien.

translation.en: - I'm good. - Take a drink, you know? Let's celebrate.
translation.es: - Toma un trago, celebremos. - No, estoy bien.

translation.en: Come on! A little sip of jallu. Go on, take some!
translation.es: Un sorbo de brandy. Anda, toma un poco.

translation.en: Hey! Come on!
- Easy, easy. Huh? - Hey!
You know? It was my fault.
- - I chose wrong, you know?
Jaakko! God damn it!
Hey, hey. Like... what, Jyrki?
- You can't fucking-- - What? Come on, Jyrki! Hello!
It's me, Jaakko. Come on, now! Seriously!
translation.es: Soy yo, Jaakko. Vamos, en verdad.

translation.en: - Everything's OK! - OK, I get it.
I get it, I get it.
- God damn it. - Oh, Jyrki, look at you...
- Nighty night. - Go away.
translation.es: Descansa. Gracias, señor Jaakko, por haber cuidado a un amigo.

translation.en: Thank you, Mr. Jaakko, for taking care of a friend.
translation.es: Gracias, señor Jaakko, por haber cuidado a un amigo.

translation.en: - Let's go! - Where?
- Let's go to the bar. To the bar, yeah? - No, I'm OK, thanks.
Let's get a couple of drinks. No?
Bayoneta.
You think he's OK?
He's OK. Better than ever, you know?
Crazy, right?
- What? - Ice hockey. Violent game for simpletons.
translation.es: - ¿Qué? - El hockey. Un juego salvaje, pero simple.

translation.en: Actually, fights are not allowed in real hockey.
translation.es: De hecho las peleas en el hockey de verdad no están permitidas.

translation.en: It's an American thing. It's pure simulations. Show business.
translation.es: Es algo americano, solo simulan. Negocio y espectáculo.

translation.en: When one of the knees touches the ice, the fighting stops, and the game goes on.
translation.es: Cuando una rodilla toca el hielo, paran la pelea y el juego sigue.

translation.en: Boxing is...
More dreadful. It's more like life, you know?
translation.es: ...es más salvaje. Se parece más a la vida.

translation.en: I saw you in Austin.
When you knocked out that Nicaraguan, what was his name?
translation.es: Cuando noqueaste al nicaragüense... ¿Cómo se llamaba?

translation.en: - Yeah, Madrigal Rivas. - Yes! He was a... a serious...
translation.es: Sí, Madrigal Rivas. ¡Sí! Fue una anestesia verdadera.

translation.en: anesthetist. A real knock- out artist.
translation.es: Fue una anestesia verdadera. Era un artista del noqueo.

translation.en: A no- brain, but some don't need it.
translation.es: No tenía cerebro, pero hay quienes no lo necesitan.

translation.en: You made a lot of people lose money that night.
translation.es: Hiciste que mucha gente perdiera dinero esa noche.

translation.en: You were a five to one on the dock, Bayoneta.
translation.es: Estabas abajo por cuatro en las apuestas, Bayoneta.

translation.en: I never liked that nickname. I think it's stupid.
translation.es: Nunca me gustó ese apodo, creo que es estúpido.

translation.en: Perhaps. Bayoneta is a rustic weapon.
translation.es: Tal vez. Una bayoneta es un arma rústica, para campesinos.

translation.en: For peasants. Your thing was always more subtle.
translation.es: Una bayoneta es un arma rústica, para campesinos. Lo tuyo era más sutil.

translation.en: Yeah, that's the kind of thing people say when they're behind a microphone.
translation.es: Esas son las cosas que dicen las personas al estar detrás de un micrófono.

translation.en: Maybe, but... journalists will see you always with a mixture of...
translation.es: Tal vez, pero... Los periodistas te vemos con una mezcla de respeto,

translation.en: - respect, envy, and pity. Its-- - Why envy? You can write your whole life.
translation.es: Los periodistas te vemos con una mezcla de respeto, envidia y piedad. Es... ¿Envidia? Puedes escribir durante toda tú vida.

translation.en: But there are eternal boxers too. Take a look at Carmona.
translation.es: Son boxeadores eternos. Mira a Carmona.

translation.en: No way, no. Carmona, he's just searching for the last bit of applause.
translation.es: No, para nada. Él busca los últimos aplausos

translation.en: And he's searching for the last few dollars.
You see? That's the kind of thing you people will never understand.
translation.es: Ese tipo de cosas nunca las entenderán.

translation.en: When you're hungry and healthy, nobody cares what can happen to you.
translation.es: Cuando tienes hambre y salud, a nadie le importa lo que te pase.

translation.en: But, when you start making serious money,
translation.es: Pero cuando empiezas a hacer buen dinero,

translation.en: a doctor shows up and says: No more.
translation.es: un doctor aparece y dice: Ya no más.

translation.en: But that wasn't what happened to you.
translation.es: Pero eso no fue lo que te pasó.

translation.en: You got an early retirement after that fight with Tremendo Duarte.
translation.es: Te retiraste antes de tiempo después de la pelea contra Tremendo Duarte. Sí.

translation.en: But I'm surprised you even know about that.
It was talked about, you know?
- Especially because of all the rumors-- - What rumors?
translation.es: Sobre todo por los rumores que... ¿Qué rumores?

translation.en: What the fuck are you talking about? What do you know about that?
Those were all lies, you know?
I'm sorry. I didn't mean to imply anything.
translation.es: Lo siento. No quería suponer nada.

translation.en: Good.
- Look at me. I'm sorry. - It's all good.
translation.es: - Mírame, lo siento. - Sí, está bien.

translation.en: Miguel. Please, I'm sorry.
- You! - Can I have another one?
Yes.
You have a touch for beer.
There you go.
Just the right amount of foam.
I sure didn't know you were an expert.
translation.es: Claro, no sabía que eras experto.

translation.en: There's a lot of things you don't know about me.
translation.es: Hay muchas cosas que no sabes sobre mí.

translation.en: I'll buy you a drink.
Of all the places in the world, I never thought I would end up here.
translation.es: De todo el mundo, jamás pensé que acabaría aquí.

translation.en: I mean, if you put a map in front of me and ask: Hey, Mickey, where's Finland?
translation.es: Si me hubieran dado un mapa y preguntado: Oye, Mickey, ¿dónde está Finlandia?,

translation.en: I'd have no idea.
I mean, I knew it was near London, or something, but...
translation.es: Sabía que estaba cerca de Londres.

translation.en: Yeah, well, I have no idea where Tijuana is.
translation.es: Yo no sé dónde está Tijuana.

translation.en: That... is a hole, at the border with the gringos.
translation.es: En un hoyo en la frontera de los gringos.

translation.en: You're not missing anything.
- But there's sun, right? - Yes.
Here, it's always night.
You get used to it, I guess. Why Finland?
I came to train Remu.
So you retired from boxing, but you couldn't stay away?
translation.es: Entonces estás retirado, pero no puedes mantenerte lejos.

translation.en: I guess.
You should.
Oh. Is this yours?
Yup. I know. Old and dead, like my soul.
translation.es: Sí. Vieja y obscura, como mi alma.

translation.en: You should go, before you freeze to death.
- Hi. - Hey.
- You came in early. - Yeah, I couldn't sleep.
translation.es: Llegaste temprano. Sí. No podía dormir.

translation.en: Mickey, there's something I have to tell you.
What?
Jyrki is bankrupt.
He thought the fight would bail him out, so he mortgaged the gym. He can't pay us.
translation.es: Pensó que la pelea le ayudaría, así que hipotecó el gimnasio. No puede pagarnos.

translation.en: What are we going to do?
We can only wait.
Motherfucker.
Shit!
Hi.
Good, good. OK, great!
Very good. Nice.
Miguel. What are you doing here?
Could you train me again?
- What? - You heard me.
I want to fight. I want you-- I want you to train me again.
translation.es: Quiero pelear. Quiero que me entrenes de nuevo.

translation.en: - Are you fucking crazy? - No.
I can do it. I still have something to give.
translation.es: Puedo hacerlo. Aún tengo algo para dar.

translation.en: I need the money. I need the money for my daughter. We need the money. We do.
translation.es: Necesito el dinero para mi hija. Necesitamos el dinero.

translation.en: - - Time!
I realized it's the only way, you know?
translation.es: Me di cuenta de que es la única forma.

translation.en: We do a good fight. And then we can stop thinking about that every fucking day.
translation.es: Damos una buena pelea y nos detenemos. Pienso en ello todos los días.

translation.en: No. OK? Get that idea out of your head.
translation.es: No, ¿está bien? Sácate eso de la cabeza.

translation.en: - There's 30, and four. - Hey.
translation.es: Aquí hay tres de 30 y cuatro... Hola.

translation.en: OK, I'll take it from here.
So now you know.
The lease on the building expires in two months.
translation.es: La renta del edificio termina en dos meses.

translation.en: Then I'm out on the street.
translation.es: Después, todos iremos a la calle.

translation.en: - Sorry I lied to you. - That's OK.
translation.es: Perdón si te mentí. Está bien.

translation.en: Doesn't matter anymore.
I need to fight.
Did you hear what I said?
Yeah.
Some days, I wake up and I feel this...
translation.es: Algunos días me levanto y siento este hoyo en mi pecho.

translation.en: hole in my chest.
translation.es: y siento este hoyo en mi pecho.

translation.en: And I think... I can't stop thinking.
translation.es: Lo que sea, yo... ...no puedo dejar de pensar.

translation.en: Crazy shit.
I don't have to know your reasons, Mickey.
translation.es: No tengo que conocer tus razones, Mickey.

translation.en: I'll pay you. We all help one another.
- Hey, Mickey. - Hey.
You're exaggerating, it's not so cold.
translation.es: No seas exagerado, no hace tanto frío.

translation.en: How did you make a living after you retired?
I worked in a cruise ship, doing the laundry.
translation.es: Trabajé en un crucero, después en una lavandería.

translation.en: And once, the singer of the ship got sick, so I did the show.
translation.es: Y una vez el cantante del crucero se enfermó y yo di el espectáculo.

translation.en: - Now you're lying. - I don't lie.
- Yes, you lie. - I don't.
translation.es: - No miento. De verdad. - Mientes, no te creo.

translation.en: - I don't believe you. - It was a huge success.
The ladies were all over me.
- Come on. Sing for me. - No.
I knew you were a liar.
What does it say?
Hmm. The same thing all songs talk about.
translation.es: Lo mismo que todas las canciones.

translation.en: And about snow.
Hey, are you coming?
Sure.
Hi. Did everything go well?
Yes. He had his evening meal and went to bed already.
translation.es: Sí, tomó su cena y se fue a dormir.

translation.en: That's great. Thank you so much.
- Be safe. - I will.
I'll be back in a minute.
Can I ask you one thing?
You want to know who the man in the photo is?
translation.es: Quieres saber quién es el hombre de la foto.

translation.en: Yes, how do you know?
I can see it in your face.
He was my husband.
You're divorced?
Remu's friend?
I thought you wanted to ask one question.
translation.es: Creí que querías hacer una pregunta.

translation.en: It was his brother.
I'm going to close my eyes now.
- Hi. - Hi.
Are you hungry?
Yes.
So?
This isn't your country, Mickey. Nobody cares about ruins.
translation.es: Este no es tú país, Mickey. A nadie le importan las ruinas.

translation.en: But, as it turns out,
call it a morbid curiosity, or whatever,
your comeback interested a couple of promoters.
translation.es: tú regreso le interesa a un par de promotores.

translation.en: April 25th, Sweden. An interesting prospect.
translation.es: Abril 25, en Suecia. Con un prospecto interesante.

translation.en: Undefeated. All by knockout.
They want you as a stepping stone.
- They're going to be surprised. - How much?
- After taxes, 2 thousand, for you. - Good.
translation.es: Después de impuestos... 2000 para ti. Bien.

translation.en: They can pay some upfront. To help our camp.
translation.es: Pueden pagar un poco por adelantado, para ayudarnos.

translation.en: So it's a good start. Now it's up to you.
translation.es: Es un buen inicio. Depende de ti.

translation.en: Who's going to coach me?
Come on, tell him.
I don't want to waste my time.
- You won't? - You sure you really want to do this?
translation.es: No lo harás. ¿Seguro que quieres hacerlo?

translation.en: I am.
Shit!
- OK! - So, it's done.
Now, you do your thing.
Yes.
Hey, hey. Stop eating that shit in my office.
translation.es: Oye, deja de comer esa mierda en mi oficina.

translation.en: - Now, get the fuck out of here. - OK.
OK, let's go!
Corner him!
Work the body, I said.
Where'd you leave your legs, Bayoneta?
No good.
Not so easy, huh? Get up and move faster.
translation.es: No es tan fácil, ¿eh? De pie y muévete más rápido.

translation.en: - Come on. - Come on!
- Are you done with that? - One more.
Yes, one more now.
What?
You see that guy at the car? Outside?
He was one of the few who took my brother down.
translation.es: Es uno de los pocos que noquearon a mi hermano.

translation.en: You knew I had a brother, Mickey? He was a fighter too.
translation.es: Yo tenía un hermano, Mickey. También era luchador.

translation.en: I watched him get up early in the morning every day to go training.
translation.es: Lo vi todas las mañanas levantarse temprano para entrenar.

translation.en: And I thought to myself, if anybody wants to get up at 4 a.m. to get a beating
translation.es: Y pensaba: Si alguien se levanta a las cuatro de la mañana para recibir una paliza, debe ser algo genial.

translation.en: it's got to be a great thing to do.
translation.es: para recibir una paliza, debe ser algo genial.

translation.en: I really looked up to him. I begged him to take me training.
translation.es: Lo admiraba. Le supliqué que me llevara a entrenar.

translation.en: He was so tough, you know? He fought almost every weekend.
translation.es: Era muy duro, peleaba casi todas las semanas.

translation.en: He never got knocked down until his 56th fight.
translation.es: Y nunca lo noquearon hasta su pelea 56.

translation.en: First time he got knocked down, we even celebrated it.
translation.es: Hasta celebramos que lo hayan hecho.

translation.en: He was a true journeyman.
But then, as time went on, he started getting knocked down more often.
translation.es: Después, el tiempo pasó y comenzaron a noquearlo más seguido.

translation.en: He'd mostly spring right up again, you know? But...
there was a day when he didn't get up.
translation.es: Y un día no se levantó.

translation.en: It was a bad neurological problem, but he didn't tell.
translation.es: Tenía un problema neurológico y no nos lo había dicho.

translation.en: Not us, not me, or Sarita. And they just had the boy, Emery.
translation.es: Ni a mí, ni a Sarita. Acababan de tener al niño.

translation.en: The doctor told him he had to stop fighting.
translation.es: El doctor dijo que tenía que parar de pelear.

translation.en: But he didn't give a damn.
He just kept taking punches like a madman, till Sarita found out about his condition,
translation.es: Siguió recibiendo golpes como un loco, hasta que Sarita supo de su enfermedad

translation.en: and threatened to take the boy away if he didn't stop.
translation.es: y lo amenazó con quitarle al niño si no paraba.

translation.en: And then...
Then, he took the ferry to Sweden.
He took his last drink, and...
he jumped into the water, and that was it.
translation.es: y saltó al agua. Eso fue todo.

translation.en: Why are you telling me this?
You're a good man, Mickey.
No, I'm not.
I never met a good guy in this business.
translation.es: Nunca he conocido a un buen hombre en este negocio.

translation.en: I'm a good guy.
Yes, I fight, but...
I don't want to hurt anyone.
Come on!
You won't last two rounds like that, come on!
translation.es: No aguantarás ni dos caídas así. Vamos.

translation.en: Come on, Miguel!
- OK, time. - Fuck.
Can we do this inside?
Can we do this inside? It's the same.
Time.
Go, Bayoneta, go!
Give me one second.
Hey, Mickey, what the fuck?
- - Hey.
Thanks for not answering my fucking messages.
translation.es: Gracias por no responder a mis malditos mensajes.

translation.en: I'm sorry, I've been pretty busy.
You told me you were retired.
translation.es: Me dijiste que te habías retirado.

translation.en: Yes.
Remu told me about his brother. About your husband.
translation.es: Remu me contó sobre su hermano. De tú esposo.

translation.en: I didn't call you because I didn't want to cause you more problems.
translation.es: No te llamé porque no quería causarte más problemas.

translation.en: Yeah, I can take care of myself. I get to do my own decisions.
translation.es: Puedo cuidarme sola. Tomo mis propias decisiones.

translation.en: - Mickey, get back here. - Yes, I'm coming.
Go.
Those legs are much better now.
Why don't you try to do something with them?
I remember when we were young, we used to go all the time on this cruise ship,
translation.es: Cuando era joven siempre tomábamos este barco.

translation.en: get drunk, smoke cigarettes, it was easier to get that stuff.
translation.es: Nos poníamos ebrios, fumábamos. esas cosas eran fáciles de conseguir.

translation.en: One time, on this one boat, I didn't like the DJ,
translation.es: En una ocasión no me gustó el DJ,

translation.en: so I walked upstairs, on top of him, and took a piss on his neck.
translation.es: así que subí las escaleras y lo enfrenté. Lo tomé por el cuello...

translation.en: Then both guards came after us, but we got away.
translation.es: ...y los oficiales me pidieron que me fuera.

translation.en: - It's me, Jyrki. - Come in.
Hey.
- Tomorrow's the big day. - Yes.
translation.es: Mañana es el gran día. Sí.

translation.en: - Who's she? - My daughter.
Don't we look alike?
It's funny, how things happen.
translation.es: Es gracioso cómo pasan las cosas.

translation.en: You know? I know you'll make it.
I knew you could make a comeback. I never doubted it.
translation.es: Sabía que volverías. - No tenía dudas. - Estoy sediento.

translation.en: I'm so thirsty, man. I could drink the whole ocean.
translation.es: - No tenía dudas. - Estoy sediento. Me bebería el océano completo.

translation.en: I told Denis I wanted you to be his assistant.
translation.es: Yo le pedí a Denis que tú fueras su asistente.

translation.en: I still believe that accident isn't enough to break a guy like you.
translation.es: Sé que un accidente no es suficiente para enterrar a un hombre como tú.

translation.en: I would've liked to know you then. Your strength.
translation.es: Ojalá lo hubieras sabido antes. Esa fuerza...

translation.en: Your determination.
I wanted my boys to learn that.
translation.es: Quería que mis chicos aprendieran eso.

translation.en: To follow your example.
Yeah, well.
translation.es: Bueno, estoy seguro de que no soy todo lo que dices, pero...

translation.en: I'm pretty sure I'm not everything you're saying, but thanks.
translation.es: Bueno, estoy seguro de que no soy todo lo que dices, pero... ...gracias.

translation.en: Yeah.
Yeah.
Yeah.
Seems like everyone bet their money on you. How does it feel?
translation.es: Parece que todos apostaron su dinero en ti.

translation.en: I don't care about money at all. I've trained hard
translation.es: El dinero no me importa. Entrené mucho para esta pelea, es todo lo que importa.

translation.en: for this fight, that's all I care about.
translation.es: Entrené mucho para esta pelea, es todo lo que importa.

translation.en: Galíndez. Suddenly, you decide to reappear out of nowhere.
translation.es: Galíndez, de la nada decides reaparecer.

translation.en: How does it feel to get your gloves back on after so long?
translation.es: ¿Cómo se siente ponerte los guantes después de tanto tiempo?

translation.en: I feel confident. We trained hard.
I'm as hungry as I was in my first fight.
translation.es: Estoy tan hambriento como en mi primera pelea.

translation.en: Five years ago, your career came into
translation.es: Hace cinco años tú carrera cayó en lo que pareció

translation.en: what at the moment seemed like an abrupt and premature end.
translation.es: Hace cinco años tú carrera cayó en lo que pareció un abrupto y prematuro final.

translation.en: What made you decide to make a comeback?
translation.es: ¿Qué fue lo que te hizo volver?

translation.en: Well, hmm,
this is the only thing I know how to do.
translation.es: Es lo único que sé hacer.

translation.en: Easy.
Just remember, Mickey...
A fighter from our very own city of Stockholm, ladies and gentlemen.
translation.es: El nativo de la vieja ciudad de Estocolmo, damas y caballeros, den la bienvenida al indiscutible,

translation.en: Please welcome the undisputed.
translation.es: damas y caballeros, den la bienvenida al indiscutible,

translation.en: Reigning, defending Scandinavian.
Welterweight champion.
Gunnar Gunther Balasevic!
Dear friends, the big question that's surely on everyone's mind is
translation.es: Queridos amigos, la gran pregunta que está en boca de todos es:

translation.en: if Miguel Bayoneta Galíndez is ready to fight at the top of his weight class.
translation.es: ¿Miguel Bayoneta Galíndez está listo para pelear en lo alto de su categoría?

translation.en: Start!
Move forward! Come on, come on! OK, stay light!
translation.es: Ve hacia adelante. Vamos, mantente, ahí.

translation.en: Come on, Mickey!
Get him, get up! Yes!
It's OK, breathe, breathe!
Yes!
The crowd goes wild, did we witness another quick knockout
translation.es: La multitud ruge. ¿Nos depara otro noqueo rápido por parte del campeón escandinavo?

translation.en: by the Scandinavian champion?
translation.es: ¿Nos depara otro noqueo rápido por parte del campeón escandinavo?

translation.en: - Come on, get up! - Mickey, wake up!
Balasevic lands a straight ring on Bayoneta's chin,
translation.es: Balasevic da un derechazo a la mandíbula de Bayoneta.

translation.en: sending him to the canvas like a rag doll.
translation.es: Enviándolo a la lona como a un muñeco de trapo.

translation.en: - ...eight. You OK? - Yes.
- Yes, yes. - Yes? Keep your guard up, go!
- Let him go! -
Come back here.
Balasevic attacks. If the Mexican wants to counter those fists,
translation.es: Balasevic ataca. Si el mexicano quisiera sortear esa ráfaga de puños,

translation.en: he has to at least find some of that old, famous Bayoneta in him.
translation.es: debe encontrar algo del famoso y viejo Bayoneta.

translation.en: Keep going, man.
Keep your distance. That's it.
You got time, you got time!
- Yes. - Yes.
Come on, move forward.
Come on, man!
Go home!
To the right, didn't lose.
Watch for his left.
Move it, kid, move it!
One, two. Yeah! That's it!
Balasevic is undoubtedly one of Sweden's most talented boxers,
translation.es: Balasevic es uno de los boxeadores suecos más talentosos.

translation.en: and his ability to take in the punches is truly admirable.
translation.es: Y su habilidad para tomar los golpes es admirable.

translation.en: But today, he's been steamrolled by a man whose comeback
translation.es: Pero hoy está siendo opacado por un hombre cuyo regreso

translation.en: seemed unlikely after his last, tragic fight.
translation.es: parecía difícil después de esa trágica y última pelea.

translation.en: Yeah, keep your guard up.
Come on, Miguel.
Easy. Not yet, one more round.
translation.es: Tranquilo, aún no. Una caída más.

translation.en: Mickey, come on, let's go!
What did you say?
What did you say?
And look at this, people. What is this man made of?
translation.es: Miren esto. ¿De qué está hecho este hombre?

translation.en: The Swede's chin must be made of steel, and his body of granite.
translation.es: El mentón del sueco debe ser de acero y su cuerpo de granito.

translation.en: Balasevic's up. Looks like he wants to see this fight to the end, no matter what.
translation.es: Balasevic se levanta. Parece que quiere pelear hasta lo último sin importar nada.

translation.en: The fight is fixed.
- He's letting me win. - No, Miguel, he's at your reach.
translation.es: Me está dejando ganar. No, Miguel, está a tú nivel. Tú puedes.

translation.en: - You can get him. - He told me: One more round.
translation.es: No, Miguel, está a tú nivel. Tú puedes. Él me dijo que aguantara una caída más.

translation.en: - He told me: One more round. - No, they wouldn't do that here.
translation.es: Me dijo que aguantara una caída más. No, no harían eso aquí.

translation.en: He told me: One more round. They want me to knock him on this one.
translation.es: Dijo que aguantara una caída más. Quieren que lo noqueé en esta.

translation.en: - No, Miguel, don't you fucking dare, OK? - Yeah, yeah. No.
translation.es: - No, Miguel, no te atrevas, maldita sea. - No, no.

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, what first seemed like a walk in the park
translation.es: Damas y caballeros, lo que parecía un juego de niños para Balasevic,

translation.en: for Balasevic has turned into a nightmare.
translation.es: lo que parecía un juego de niños para Balasevic, se convirtió en una pesadilla.

translation.en: Come on, Miguel, fight!
Get close, come on, come on! Fight, Miguel!
What are you doing?
Something's wrong with Bayoneta,
he's hardly countering any of the punches. He turned his back to his opponent.
translation.es: No está contrarrestando los golpes. Le está dando la espalda a su oponente.

translation.en: Come on, fight!
Mickey, you can't do this!
Come on, kid! What are you doing?
Bayoneta is no longer fighting, which leads to his disqualification.
translation.es: Bayoneta no peleará. Eso significa su descalificación.

translation.en: - Fuck! -
This is the main event.
The main event, from Las Vegas, Nevada.
The door was open.
It makes no sense, man.
What?
All the time we spent in the ring.
translation.es: Todo el tiempo que pasamos en el cuadrilátero.

translation.en: For you. Take it, Miguel, It's yours.
Take it.
- Why did you make me do it, man? - Stop it, there.
translation.es: ¿Cómo me hiciste hacerlo? - Para. - ¿Cómo me hiciste hacerlo?

translation.en: How'd you make me do it? Why don't you want to hear it?
You don't because you are just as guilty as me, man.
translation.es: No quieres escuchar que eres tan culpable como yo.

translation.en: Just as guilty. When are you going to take responsibility for what we did?
translation.es: ¿Cuándo tomarás la responsabilidad de lo que hicimos, Denis?

translation.en: He put that shit on the bandages.
translation.es: Él puso esa mierda en los vendajes, Denis.

translation.en: We cheat.
You think I don't know it?
You think I don't think about it every fucking day?
translation.es: ¿Crees que no pienso en eso todos los malditos días?

translation.en: I wasn't only about you and me, Mickey. There were a lot of people involved.
translation.es: La cuestión no era solo nuestra, chico. Había mucha gente implicada.

translation.en: It was something bigger than us, and you know it.
translation.es: Era algo más grande que nosotros y lo sabes.

translation.en: Birthday boy.
Hi.
- Happy birthday. - Hi.
- Hi. - Hi.
- Hey. - Hey.
I just wanted to say goodbye.
- You're leaving? - Yeah.
I'm going back to Tijuana.
Do you want to come?
I could bring you and the kid.
- What would I do in such a sunny place? - Yeah.
translation.es: ¿Qué haríamos en un lugar con tanto sol? Sí...

translation.en: - I had to try. - Yeah.
OK, who wants some cake?
Isn't it nice? Thanks.
Is that a bit slanted?
It's gorgeous. Isn't it?
I'm happy with it too.
- Did you make this yourself? - Yes, I made it all by myself.
translation.es: ¿Lo hiciste tú? Claro que lo hice yo.

translation.en: So, the birthday boy is here.
translation.es: El chico del cumpleaños está aquí.

translation.en: This is a bit like...
What cake is this?
I think it's a chocolate cake.
translation.es: Me parece que es de chocolate.

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.es: ¿Y qué es lo que tiene encima?

translation.en: All the goodies. Here we go, birthday boy first.
translation.es: Cosas deliciosas. Aquí vamos, el chico del cumpleaños primero.
